resources.string: Do or do not. There is no try.
Coruscant is the capital of the Galactic Republic
Emperor Palpatine is the galaxy\'s salvation
Darth Vader has the best hallway scene
The destruction of the 2nd Death Star likely wasted the Forest Moon of Endor
Obi Wan is king of the low ground
Tatooine is where everything important happens
Obi Wan has taught you well!
You have much to learn, my very young apprentice.
The Dark Side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. Are you sure you want to do this?
You were the Chosen One! It was said that you would destroy the Sith, not join them! Bring balance to the Force, not leave it in darkness!
